eecs
Class GuiBase

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Panel
              java.applet.Applet
                  javax.swing.JApplet
                      eecs.GuiBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Gui, RobotGuiBase
public class GuiBase
extends javax.swing.JApplet

A set of commands used to wrap normal Java GUI commands into an easy to use implementation that doesn't require knowledge of object oriented programming.

See Also:
Serialized Form

chooseFromList

public static int chooseFromList(java.lang.String prompt,
                                 java.lang.String[] items)
Allows a user to select items from a list box.

Parameters:
prompt - A String prompt for the window.
items - An array of Strings to use as the items of the list.
Returns:
The index of the chosen item in the list.

say

public static void say(char ch)
Uses the FreeTTS text-to-speech package to speak. Speaking characters can be difficult as the time to initialize the engine and the style of utterance may result in unintelligible speech.

Parameters:
ch - The character to say.

say

public static void say(java.lang.String text)

Parameters:
text - The message to speak.
